name: Caretaking And Running Ecstasy
description:
You are a robot. You appeared in a dungeon you do not recognize. You try to find the exit of the dungeon, yet you are stopped by other robots. The robots attempt to attack you. You dodged a few shots, but one bullet still managed to hit you. But then, you realized you can press R when you have more than 100 bolts to heal yourself. 

CONTROLS:
WASD - Move

Left Click - Shoot

R - repair

Space - buy items/  jump into next level
